僁字的基本解释

僁
xiè
象声词：“僁僁”，拨动草声。绸衣相碰之声。鸟声。

僁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiè］［xī］
［《廣韻》先結切，入屑，心。］
［《廣韻》息七切，入質，心。］
见“僁窣”。

僁字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　僁； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页115第16
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?先結切，音屑。【爾雅·釋言】聲也。【疏】言聲音僁僁然也。【玉篇】小聲也。一曰僁僁，呻吟也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?息七切，音悉。義同。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋詁】聲也。〕　謹照原書釋詁改釋言。
僁字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
僁字的起名意思

暂无。

Yan
Basic explanation of words
Yan
xiè
Onomatopoeia: "Yanyan", poke the grass sound. The sound of silk clothes colliding. Bird sound.
Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiè］［xī］
["Guangyun" first knots, cuts, and heart. ]
["Guangyun" breathes seven cuts, enters the quality, and the heart. ]
See "Yan Yan".
Yan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　僁; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 115-16
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? First knot and cut, sound scraps. 【Erya·Interpretation】Sound also. [Shu] The voice of speech is Yan Yan. [Jade articles] In a low voice. One said 僁僁, groaning too.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Qi Qi cuts the interest, the sound is informed. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Erya·Shi Xuan] Sheng Ye. 〕　I would like to change the interpretation according to the original book.
